scripts.build:win32: rm -rf dist && rollup index.js --config cjs.config.js && rollup index.js --config esm.config.js && echo { "type": "module" } > dist/esm/package.json && echo { "type": "commonjs" } > dist/cjs/package.json && cd dist && exitzero standard --fix */*.js && tsc ../index.js --declaration --allowJs --emitDeclarationOnly --target ESNext --moduleResolution node
